resources.string: MLA Hostel No.2, Krishnanagar, Agartala, Tripura(West), India
How can I register to FoodRunner ?
In the Login page, you can click on the Sign Up text and the Register Yourself page will open where you can fill in your details, and then click on the Register button to register your account.
Where can I see the list of foods ?
You can click on any restaurant from the All Restaurants page and then on the Food Menu page of that restaurant you can see all the foods available in that restaurant in that food menu.
Where can I see my order details ?
After you select all the foods that you want to order, you can click on the Proceed to Cart button to open the My Cart page where you can all the details of that particular order.
Can I check my previous orders ?
In the Navigation bar there is a Order History option, clicking on which you can open the My Previous Orders page and see all your previous orders and their details.
Can I check my account profile details ?
In the Navigation bar there is a My Profile option, clicking on which you can open the My Profile page and see all your profile details.
How many restaurants are available in FoodRunner ?
There are a total of 17 restaurants in FoodRunner and you can see all of them in the All Restaurants page.
